sentences.sContent: They tried to handcuff him but, despite his injuries, he fought his way free.
sentences.sCn: 他们试图用手铐铐住他，但尽管他受了伤，还是奋力挣脱了。

sentences.sContent: He was led away to jail in handcuffs.
sentences.sCn: 他戴着手铐被送进监狱。

trans.tranOther: Handcuffs are two metal rings which are joined together and can be locked around someone's wrists, usually by the police during an arrest
